languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс дергает головой и отмахивается — слишком резко, слишком неестественно для себя.{/n} "Об этом мы поговорим позже. А прямо сейчас..."
{n}Heinrix jerks his head and waves away the question, his movements sharp and unnatural.{/n} "We'll talk about it later. But right now..."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс дергает головой и отмахивается — слишком резко, слишком неестественно для себя.{/n} "Об этом мы поговорим позже. А прямо сейчас..."

languages.text: {n}海因里希扭过了头，挥挥手，他的动作急切而僵硬。{/n}“这个问题咱们之后再讨论吧，至于现在……”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix jerks his head and waves away the question, his movements sharp and unnatural.{/n} "We'll talk about it later. But right now..."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希扭过了头，挥挥手，他的动作急切而僵硬。{/n}“这个问题咱们之后再讨论吧，至于现在……”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix mueve la cabeza de forma errática y desestima la pregunta con un gesto. Sus movimientos son precisos, pero poco naturales.{/n} «Ya hablaremos de eso más adelante. Ahora mismo...».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix jerks his head and waves away the question, his movements sharp and unnatural.{/n} "We'll talk about it later. But right now..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix mueve la cabeza de forma errática y desestima la pregunta con un gesto. Sus movimientos son precisos, pero poco naturales.{/n} «Ya hablaremos de eso más adelante. Ahora mismo...».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは首を振ってその質問を払いのけた。彼の動きは鋭く、不自然だった。{/n}「それについては後で話しましょう。ですが今は…」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix jerks his head and waves away the question, his movements sharp and unnatural.{/n} "We'll talk about it later. But right now..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは首を振ってその質問を払いのけた。彼の動きは鋭く、不自然だった。{/n}「それについては後で話しましょう。ですが今は…」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix weist die Frage mit einem abrupten Kopfschütteln ab, seine Bewegungen sind abgehackt und unnatürlich.{/n} "Darüber sprechen wir später. Aber jetzt ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix jerks his head and waves away the question, his movements sharp and unnatural.{/n} "We'll talk about it later. But right now..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix weist die Frage mit einem abrupten Kopfschütteln ab, seine Bewegungen sind abgehackt und unnatürlich.{/n} "Darüber sprechen wir später. Aber jetzt ..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix tourne la tête brusquement en balayant votre question d'un geste de la main. Ses mouvements abrupts ne semblent pas naturels.{/n} « Nous en reparlerons plus tard. Pour le moment... »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix jerks his head and waves away the question, his movements sharp and unnatural.{/n} "We'll talk about it later. But right now..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix tourne la tête brusquement en balayant votre question d'un geste de la main. Ses mouvements abrupts ne semblent pas naturels.{/n} « Nous en reparlerons plus tard. Pour le moment... »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, gayritabii ve ani hareketlerle başını geriye atıp soruyu savuşturuyor.{/n} "Bu meseleyi daha sonra konuşuruz. Şimdi..."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix jerks his head and waves away the question, his movements sharp and unnatural.{/n} "We'll talk about it later. But right now..."
